body:
Day 10 - Manga 247*
What did I do to deserve this.
1/10.
The number of ones out of ten that I gave must be pretty big.
Fuck, why do I have to wait two minutes to comment? It won't stop the spammers.
Really bad art that makes it feel unfinished, also the fact it gave me some slight whiplash with the pacing 3/10
